name: Redemption (V)
Lore: 'Nebulon-B frigate used as a mobile medical facility. Extra cargo space and weapon batteries have been modified to allow for more armor and more recovery areas.',
Text: 'May add 4 pilots and 4 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Bacta Tank deploys for free and is lost if Redemption lost. X on Bacta Tank is -2.',
